由于以客户为中心的方法和质量承诺，Logical Biological 被评为“欧洲发展最快的公司”之一Logical Biological 专门为诊断和治疗研究和开发提供人类血清、血浆、拭子、组织、PBMC 和其他生物样本。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240314/Logical-Biological-recognized-as-one-of-e28098Europes-fastest-having-companiese28099-due-to-customer-centric-approach-and-quality-承诺.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240314/Logical-Biological-recognized-as-one-of-e28098Europes-fastest-having-companiese28099-due-to-customer-centric-approach-and-quality-承诺.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a50af9bc-5438-4f2a-88c6-038b8950bc2d Thu, 14 Mar 2024 11:20:00 -0400 Logical Biological recognized as one of ‘Europe's fastest-growing companies’ due to customer centric approach and quality commitment

研究凸显了 p-tau217 检测在阿尔茨海默病临床试验和诊断中的潜力两种商业磷酸化 tau217 (p-tau217) 检测的性能。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240314/Study-highlights-pottial-of-p-tau217-assays-in-Alzheimers-clinical-trials-and-diagnosis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240314/Study-highlights-pottial-of-p-tau217-assays-in-Alzheimers-clinical-trials-and-diagnosis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e5c435e2-e9fd-4c56-953a-d1c0a1e9bbbb Thu, 14 Mar 2024 06:03:00 -0400 Study highlights potential of p-tau217 assays in Alzheimer's clinical trials and diagnosis
快速、易于使用的诊断测试可以挽救更多类鼻疽患者的生命在全球范围内，超过一半的患者在感染被忽视的热带疾病类鼻疽后死亡，通常是在确诊之前。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240313/Rapid-easy-to-use-diagnostic-test-could-save-more-lives-from-melioidosis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240313/Rapid-easy-to-use-diagnostic-test-could-save-more-lives-from-melioidosis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=860b04ca-fc52-4eba-8bcf-255618962fa5 Wed, 13 Mar 2024 23:58:00 -0400 Rapid, easy-to-use diagnostic test could save more lives from melioidosis
创新的等离子体激活水凝胶敷料彻底改变了慢性伤口护理一个国际科学家团队已经开发出一种有效的慢性伤口治疗方法，不使用抗生素，而是使用电离气体来激活伤口敷料。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240313/Innovative-plasma-activated-Hydrogel-dressings-revolutionize-chronic-wound-care.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240313/Innovative-plasma-activated-Hydrogel-dressings-revolutionize-chronic-wound-care.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ab809ede-de02-45be-b509-b7995bdd8a7b Wed, 13 Mar 2024 23:52:00 -0400 Innovative plasma-activated hydrogel dressings revolutionize chronic wound care
新研究强调饮食在对抗白癜风中的作用富含抗氧化剂的饮食和营养干预措施在减轻白癜风症状方面显示出潜在的益处，强调需要进一步研究以巩固饮食指南和传统治疗方法。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240313/Diets-role-in-fighting-vitiligo-highlighted-in-new-research.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240313/Diets-role-in-fighting-vitiligo-highlighted-in-new-research.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8bc185d8-b577-401d-ac10-3e1d192f22fe Wed, 13 Mar 2024 23:43:00 -0400 Diet's role in fighting vitiligo highlighted in new research
Relugolix 和放射疗法可能是治疗前列腺癌的安全、有效的组合由大学医院塞德曼癌症中心放射肿瘤学主席 Daniel Spratt 医学博士领导的一项高影响力研究表明，新型口服激素疗法 relugolix 与放射疗法相结合，可治疗男性局部和全身性癌症，具有安全性和有效性。晚期前列腺癌。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240313/Relugolix-and-radiation-therapy-may-be-a-safe- effective-combination-for-treating-prostate-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240313/Relugolix-and-radiation-therapy-may-be-a-safe- effective-combination-for-treating-prostate-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=764a9411-5e65-4c6c-947f-7806d5389cb2 Wed, 13 Mar 2024 23:31:00 -0400 Relugolix and radiation therapy may be a safe, effective combination for treating prostate cancer
